official_title: To designate the Federal building and United States courthouse located at 120 12th Street in Columbus, Georgia, as the "J. Robert Elliott Federal Building and United States Courthouse".

summary.text: Designates the Federal building and U.S. courthouse located at 120 12th Street in Columbus, Georgia, as the J. Robert Elliott Federal Building and United States Courthouse.
